data.title: Precise datatypes
data.description: Define input and output data using intuitive data types that cover a wide range of data needs. A datatype in mockback is capable of supporting your business domain attribute validation.

data.title: Automated domain data
data.description: You get randomly generated data for every record, everytime. Based on the datatype, system returns a random data that complies with the datatype specification.

data.title: Pagination support
data.description: Limit the number of records that you get as an output from endpoints that return a list of records. You can call the API with exact number or the range of records.
